Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After getting rid of all the Corrupted in the area, you spot someone familiar in the data you have picked up.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This is... the girl who was looking for her sister. Based on the timestamp, this happened not long after she hung up the phone...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I wonder if she did find her sister... Should I replay the record?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{3: 'With the sound of tires screeching, a raggedy jeep brakes abruptly in front of the ruins. The researcher called Angel jumps out of it with three Constructs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: 'The road has been destroyed. We have to go on foot, but...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the four of them approach their destination, each begins to show different signs of infection.'}
{2: 'Construct B', 3: "The Punishing Virus concentration here is getting dangerously high. Are you sure she's here?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angel', 3: "You can turn around if you're scared.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'I know my sister is here for a fact, just like how she always found me when we played hide-and-seek as kids. Our blood has bonded us.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She injects herself with a serum, then runs forward without looking back.'}
{3: "A female Construct walks out of the ruins' shadows and calmly gazes at Angel."}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Sister! I found you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "Actually, I found you. But he's right, you should turn around.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Yes, I should go back, and so should you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "I chose this, Angel. You shouldn't interfere.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'I just want to be with you, Sister!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Be with me...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Angel, when I fought as a Construct, I witnessed terrible deaths over and over again.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "At this rate, you'll lose me sooner or later.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'The only way to save me from the threat of the Punishing Virus is doing what Gabriel the angel told me to do.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'If there is a shortcut, then why are we still fighting against the virus?!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Good question. Every "shortcut" comes with a certain risk. However, if the alternative is to die in battle like the others, I\'d rather take the risk. I was never born to fight. I was born to do research with you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Sister... Did you come to that conclusion after being wounded?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: "I've always wanted to apologize... You gave up your future so that I could remain a researcher...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "...Only I was compatible with the copolymers. It wasn't your fault.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: "But... But if I also gave up my position, then we could've just survived as humans!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "Don't be silly. You only agreed to do research with me because that was the safest option.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "But ever since I became a Construct, you can't stay focused on your job. It's only a matter of time before you're fired.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'You know very well what it means to lose that job now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Regardless, there\'s no "if." I am what I am already.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Did you conceal your injuries from me because you were worried about me?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'There is a sudden movement in the shadows of the ruins, but no one besides Liadrin has sensed it at all.'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Angel, you have to leave now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: "Why? I won't leave without you. Come with me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: "We've been together since we were born. You're my only family left in this world!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: "It's too dangerous here. Go, go with them!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'No! Sister... I always did what you told me to do... but this time...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Angel's voice is shaking. Tears rush out of her eyes uncontrollably. She tosses her gun and throws herself at Liadrin."}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Just let me follow my heart for once... Sister!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liadrin tries to push away Angel, who is holding onto her arm, but in a split second—'}
{3: "Angel's body falls backward while her hand is still tightly clasping Liadrin's arm."}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Angel!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The other three Constructs react immediately to this horrifying scene. They hold up their weapons and fire fiercely at Gabriel, but all of them are incapacitated after just a few seconds.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Looks like the material is here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'What did you say?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'I knew I was right about you. You have the gift. All you need is a little extra help.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Sister...'}
{3: 'Angel focuses away from the excruciating pain. She presses hard against her severed wrist and wipes off the blood splashed into her eyes.'}

{3: "But when she opens her eyes again, everything is still covered in red—the Punishing Virus is gushing out from Gabriel's hand. It then transforms into a bright red electric current and wraps itself around Liadrin like a bloody worm."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Ahhhh!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Watch this closely.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gabriel hurls a broken slate at the immobilized researcher, crushing her ribs loudly before she realizes what is happening.'}
{3: 'Angel shakily stretches out her intact hand toward Liadrin.'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: '...Sister... I just want to... be with you...'}
{2: 'Angel', 3: 'Without you... I...'}
{3: 'Her unfinished words disappear into the wind. The stretched out hand heavily drops on the ground.'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Very good. You'll do well as one of us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liadrin', 3: 'Ahhhhhhhh!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: "Liadrin's wailing echoes painfully over the ruins but does not bring her any comfort. The living creatures around the area regard it merely as shrieking winds."}
{3: 'Still being corroded by the Punishing Virus, she raises her weapon and uses all of her strength to strike the Ascendant whom she thought was an angel—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "After that, Liadrin's projection vanishes."}
